mapper.sql:
/* 영화 조회수 조회 쿼리 */
select r_movie_no , count(r_movie_no) as viewCnt from web_app_test2.tb_movie_view group by r_movie_no
mapper.select:
/* 전체 영화 개수 조회 쿼리 */
select count(*) from web_app_test2.tb_movie where use_yn = 'y'

/* 메인 영화 리스트 조회 쿼리 */
select tb_m.title as movieTitle , tb_m.link as link , tb_m_t_i.web_thumbnail_url as webThumbnailUrl , ifnull(tb_m_v.viewCnt, 0) as viewCnt from web_app_test2.tb_movie as tb_m inner join web_app_test2.tb_movie_thumbnail_img as tb_m_t_i on tb_m.r_movie_no = tb_m_t_i.r_movie_no left outer join () as tb_m_v on tb_m.r_movie_no = tb_m_v.r_movie_no order by viewCnt desc limit 2

/* 전체 영화 리스트 조회 쿼리 */
select tb_m.r_movie_no as movieNo , tb_m.m_n_no as madeNatureNo , tb_m.title as movieTitle , tb_m.director as directorName , tb_m.link as link , tb_m.total_number_of_episode as totalNumberOfEpisode , tb_m_t_i.web_thumbnail_url as webThumbnailUrl , ifnull(tb_m_v.viewCnt, 0) as viewCnt , date_format(tb_m.movie_reg_dt, '%Y-%m-%d') as movieRegDt , date_format(tb_m.reg_dt, '%Y-%m-%d') as regDt from web_app_test2.tb_movie as tb_m inner join web_app_test2.tb_movie_thumbnail_img as tb_m_t_i on tb_m.r_movie_no = tb_m_t_i.r_movie_no left outer join () as tb_m_v on tb_m.r_movie_no = tb_m_v.r_movie_no where tb_m.use_yn = 'y' order by str_to_date(movieRegDt, '%Y-%m-%d') desc

/* 단일 책 리스트 조회 쿼리 */
select tb_m.r_movie_no as movieNo , tb_m.m_n_no as madeNatureNo , tb_m.title as movieTitle , tb_m.director as directorName , tb_m.link as link , tb_m.total_number_of_episode as totalNumberOfEpisode , tb_m_t_i.web_thumbnail_url as webThumbnailUrl , ifnull(tb_m_v.viewCnt, 0) as viewCnt , date_format(tb_m.movie_reg_dt, '%Y-%m-%d') as movieRegDt , date_format(tb_m.reg_dt, '%Y-%m-%d') as regDt from web_app_test2.tb_movie as tb_m left outer join () as tb_m_v on tb_m.r_movie_no = tb_m_v.r_movie_no left outer join web_app_test2.tb_movie_thumbnail_img as tb_m_t_i on tb_m.r_movie_no = tb_m_t_i.r_movie_no where tb_m.use_yn = 'y' and tb_m.r_movie_no = #{movieNo}
